alert.note: Alert for Laramie (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 12 at 3:27PM MDT until July 12 at 4:15PM MDT by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: The National Weather Service in Cheyenne has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... South central Laramie County in southeastern Wyoming... * Until 415 PM MDT. * At 326 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Warren AFB, or 7 miles southwest of Cheyenne, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... South Greeley. This includes the following highways... Interstate 25 in Wyoming between mile markers 1 and 8. Interstate 80 in Wyoming between mile markers 351 and 357. HAIL THREAT...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
